Localization.Name: Curelife
Localization.Description: Makes medical packs for commercial purposes. Formed by a group of doctors, CureLife was the first company to offer heavy medical solutions to the general public.

English.Name: Curelife
English.Description: Makes medical packs for commercial purposes. Formed by a group of doctors, CureLife was the first company to offer heavy medical solutions to the general public.

Localization.Name: BoostPen Xtra
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: CureLife
Item Type: Medical Consumable

From the Empire’s most trusted medical company, the CureLife BoostPen Xtra delivers a high dose of the potent stimulant Modamphetamine to greatly increase wakefulness and diminish awareness of pain in emergency situations.

English.Name: BoostPen Xtra
English.Description:
Manufacturer: CureLife
Item Type: Medical Consumable

From the Empire’s most trusted medical company, the CureLife BoostPen Xtra delivers a high dose of the potent stimulant Modamphetamine to greatly increase wakefulness and diminish awareness of pain in emergency situations.

CommodityComponentParams.name: MedPen (Hemozal)
CommodityComponentParams.description:
Manufacturer: CureLife
Item Type: Medical Consumable

From the Empire’s most trusted medical company, the CureLife MedPen can rapidly dispense doses of the coagulant Hemozal during emergency situations to help relieve bleeding and improve a patient’s overall vitals. Use only as recommended.
